All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddEvent
Fragment class for adding events
AdminEventArrayAdapter
AdminEventArrayAdapter - - this class is for populating the recycler view with different events * - the methods are for inflating views, binding positions and getting the size of user list
AdminEventArrayAdapter.buttonListener
buttonListener - interface for listening to clicked buttons
AdminEventItemView
AdminEventItemView - this is for what is is being displayed for each event that is listed - also for capturing the position when the item is clicked on
AdminEventsList
AdminEventsList - allows admin to view all the events and click on each one to get more information
AdminFragment

AdminManageEvents - allows admin to view more info about the user and also delete the user

AdminManageProfile - allows admin to view more info about the user and also delete the user

AdminProfileArrayAdapter - this class is for populating the recycler view with different profiles - the methods are for ifnlating views, binding positions and getting the size of user list
AdminProfileArrayAdapter.buttonListener
buttonListener - interface for listening to clicked buttons
AdminProfileItemView
AdminProfileItemView - this is for what is is being displayed for each profile that is listed - also for capturing the position when the item is clicked on
AdminProfilesList
AdminProfilesList - allows admin to view all the profiles and click on each one to get more information
Announcement
This represents the object, announcement, that Organizers will make to show to the Attendees.
AnnouncementAdapter
Announcement adapter: allows us to add values in our RecyclerView Represents the adapter that for announcements to display in the UI
AnnouncementViewHolder
ViewHolder represents our object (announcement) in the RecyclerView, per row.
AttendeeEventList
Attendee Event List Page functionality Deals with getting the events out of the database and displaying it on the UI.
AttendeeFragment
This deals with the functionality regarding how the Attendee can navigate (using the navBar) around the application's fragments (specific for the Attendee) relevant to each navBar button.
AttendeeHome
This represents the fragment home page for the Attendee Additionally, it also deals with displaying announcements on the Attendee's home page.
CheckedInAttendeeAdapter
adapter class for the RecyclerView displaying checked-in attendees manages the data of attendees and binds it to views that are displayed within a RecyclerView
CheckedInAttendeeAdapter.OnItemClickListener
interface definition for a callback - invoked when an item in this adapter is clicked
CheckedInAttendeeAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder describes an item view and metadata about its place within the RecyclerView
CheckedInAttendeeList
fragment class for displaying a list of attendees who have checked into an event.
CheckInQR
This class manages displaying and generating QR codes for event check-ins.
DatabaseConstants
This class holds all the constants used to connect to the database.
EditProfile
This class is the fragment for the edit profile page.
Event
Represents an event in the application.
EventDashboard
This class manages the display of event details in the dashboard.
EventDetails
Class for the Event Details page.
EventItemArrayAdapter
Event array adapter for RecyclerView (Similar to ListyCity's but some functionality is in EventItemViewHolder)
EventItemArrayAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Listener
EventItemViewHolder
Event ViewHolder for RecyclerView
GenerateQR
 
ImgHandler
A class to upload and serve images from our firebase DB.
ImgHandler.retrievalCallback
Interface needed for async image retrieval.
ImgHandler.uploadCallback
Interface needed for async image upload.
InnerPageFragment
Deals with the functionality for the back button
MainActivity
 
Milestone
This class represents milestones Titles would be along the lines of "Bronze check-in" etc.
MilestoneAdapter
Milestone adapter: allows us to add values in our RecyclerView with our milestones.
MilestoneViewHolder
ViewHolder represents our object (milestone) in the RecyclerView, per row.
OrganizerEventList
Organizer Event List Page Functionality
OrganizerFragment
Fragment for Organizers, deals with the functionality of the navBar to ensure Organizer can navigate through each relevant fragment FOR the organizer using the navBar
OrganizerHome
Represents the home page for the organizer, also deals with the functionality of displaying milestones relevant for the organizer/'s events ISSUE: MISSING IMPLEMENTATION OF THE ORGANIZER ANNOUNCING.
Profile
Represents the page for the profile of the user
PromotionQR
This class manages displaying the QR code linking to the event's description and poster.

Represents the users of the app; Attendees, Organizers, and Admins

Represents the different types for each user: attendee, organizer, admin
